recipes.description: The best homemade cinnamon rolls ever!
steps: Combine flour, sugar, yeast and salt in bowl
Heat water, milk, and butter until very warm
Stir in flour mixture and eggs
Knead dough until smooth
Cover and let rest for 10 minutes
Roll out dough
Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon
Roll up tightly and pinch seams to seal
Cut into 15 pieces
Place on baking pan
Cover and let sit for 30 minutes
Preheat oven to 375 degrees
Bake for 30 minutes
Combine flour, sugar, yeast and salt in bowl
Heat water, milk, and butter until very warm
Stir in flour mixture and eggs
Knead dough until smooth
Cover and let rest for 1 hour
Roll out dough
Cut out donuts and let rise for 45 minutes
Fry donuts
Preheat oven to 425 degrees
Whisk pumpkin, condensed milk, eggs, spices and salt in bowl until smooth
Pour into pie crust
Bake for 15 minutes
Reduce temperature to 350 degrees and continue baking for 40 minutes
